recepie_Ingredients: 8 oz spaghetti,2 large eggs,1/2 cup grated Parmesan cheese,4 slices bacon, 2 cloves garlic, minced Sat and pepper
recepie_Description: Spaghetti Carbonara is a classic Italian dish made with spaghetti, eggs, pancetta, and cheese. The sauce is made by combining raw eggs with hot pasta to create a creamy, rich coating. It's a quick and easy meal that's perfect for a weeknight dinner.

recepie_Ingredients: 2 boneless, skinless chicken breasts, 1/4 cup olive oil, 1/4 cup red wine vinegar, 2 tablespoons Dijon mustard, 1 tablespoon honey, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon black pepper, 4 cups mixed greens, 1/2 cup cooked quinoa, 1/2 cup cherry tomatoes, halved, 1/2 avocado, diced, 1/4 cup sliced almonds
recepie_Description: Grilled Chicken & Quinoa Salad is a healthy and tasty dish that is perfect for lunch or dinner. It combines grilled chicken with quinoa, vegetables, and a tangy dressing for a satisfying and nutritious meal.

recepie_Ingredients: 1 onion chopped,3 garlic cloves minced,1 pound mushrooms sliced,1 1/2 cups Arborio rice,4 cups vegetable broth,1/2 cup dry white wine,2 tablespoons olive oil,1/4 cup nutritional yeast,1/4 cup chopped fresh parsley,Salt and pepper to taste
recepie_Description: Vegan Mushroom Risotto is a creamy and flavorful Italian rice dish that is made without any dairy products. This recipe is loaded with savory mushrooms, onions, garlic, and vegetable broth, and topped with fresh parsley.

recepie_Ingredients: 1 cup all-purpose flour, tablespoon baking powder,1/4 teaspoon salt, tablespoon sugar, egg, beaten, cup milk, tablespoons melted butter, cup blueberries
recepie_Description: Blueberry pancakes are a delicious breakfast treat made by adding fresh blueberries to a pancake batter. The batter is cooked on a griddle until golden brown and fluffy, and then served hot with a drizzle of maple syrup.

recepie_Ingredients: 1/2 cup tomato sauce, 1/2 cup shredded mozzarella cheese, 1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese, 1/4 cup fresh basil leaves, 1 pre-made pizza crust, Salt and pepper to taste
recepie_Description: Classic Margherita Pizza is a simple yet delicious pizza with a thin crust, tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella cheese, and fresh basil leaves. It originated in Naples, Italy, and is a popular pizza all over the world.

recepie_Ingredients: 1 cucumber chopped,1 green bell pepper chopped,1 red onion,2 tomatoes,1/2 cup crumbled feta cheese,1/4 cup Kalamata olives,2 tablespoons olive oil,1 tablespoon red wine vinegar,1 teaspoon dried oregano,Salt and pepper to taste
recepie_Description: Greek salad is a refreshing and healthy dish that typically includes tomatoes, cucumbers, red onions, Kalamata olives, and feta cheese, dressed with olive oil and lemon juice. It is a simple yet delicious way to enjoy fresh vegetables and a taste of the Mediterranean.
